@rposbo @stubbornella @LorienMCS Logically they do seem similar. But in practice and when deploying code and content changes they have quite different implications. If pre-rendering, deployment can be sending everything to the CDN. Thatâ€™s not the case with SSR if code/data/content might all change independently.
